Post-Match Reflections: India vs Sri Lanka 1st T20I Highlights: Sri Lanka seemed set to surprise world champions India in their chase of 214 as Pathum Nissanka led their charge with a 48-ball 79. However, Sri Lanka collapsed in a heap after he was dismissed by Axar Patel in the 15th over.

India vs Sri Lanka Live Score, IND vs SL 1st T20I: Well, Sri Lanka have gone from 140/1 in 14 overs to being 170 all out. In between that, they lost five wickets in three overs and that pretty much ended any chances they had of pulling off a famous win over the world champions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Parag reels off the last two wickets off the first two balls of the over itself and India's new era begins with a resounding win
Credit to India. There were a few misfields but they kept their eyes on the ball even when Nissanka was leading the Sri Lankan charge
Well, is this where the world champions get back in it?
India vs Sri Lanka Live Score, IND vs SL 1st T20I: Relief for Bishnoi as Axar makes sure his drop wasn't too expensive
